title: Lakers-Clippers, Tom Brady, MVP, & Jim Harbaugh
itunes:title: Lakers-Clippers, Tom Brady, MVP, & Jim Harbaugh
description:
Colin gives his reasons why he is enjoying the Lakers-Clippers rivalry, why he doesn't believe Tom Brady will be leaving the Patriots, his thoughts on possible NFL MVPs, and his response to the Jim Harbaugh leaving Michigan rumors. Guests include Chris Broussard, Nick Wright, Joel Klatt, and Leonard Fournette.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
